# set directory

opts_knit$set(root.dir = proj)

opts_chunk$set(include = TRUE)
opts_chunk$set(eval = TRUE)

# set reticulate options

library(reticulate)
use_virtualenv(venv, required = TRUE)
py_available(TRUE)
